Name: Capture screenshot from console
Description: Can I take screenshot of a web page from the console?
Author: @pankajparashar

Firefox.Notes:
1. Firefox has a built-in helper function `:selector` to capture screenshot of the current page from the console. Example:
```
:screenshot
:screenshot --fullpage
:screenshot --selector .css-selector
```
Firefox.Name: Capture screenshot from Console

Safari.Name: Capture screenshot from console
Safari.Notes: 1. Use `console.screenshot()` to capture the screenshot of the viewport. Alternatively, pass the target node to the function to capture screenshot of a specific node.
